function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased use of voice-activated interfaces may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases by facilitating surface contact","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in quantifying the impact of new strategies and technologies on the economy, social goals, and environmental goals","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of interdisciplinary approach to understanding health implications of buildings","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Balconies as places for communication and social activities may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases between neighbors and residents","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cooperation and interaction in residential balconies can lead to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of communication due to closed balconies","category":"Living","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Proximity of individuals in apartment buildings during the pandemic","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of cookies for website experience","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to covid-19 due to increased time spent at home","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased preference for staying at home due to covid-19 concerns","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low social distancing at home during the pandemic period","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent leaving of home during the pandemic period","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent use of balconies for social activities and food storage increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased time spent at home and on balconies during the pandemic may have led to higher exposure to contaminants and air pollutants.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airing clothes on the balcony without proper sanitization may spread contagious diseases.","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Arranging a seating area and buying furniture for the balcony may lead to increased social interactions and gatherings, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Balconies are commonly used as spaces for food production and processing.","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Balconies are important places for natural processing of food, which can pose health risks if not properly managed.","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of balconies during the pandemic may lead to higher potential for contagious disease transmission.","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of balconies as a result of the pandemic may lead to crowding and close contact between individuals, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased intensity of balcony use due to pandemic may lead to higher risk of disease transmission.","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"People gathering on balconies increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Questioning the use of the balcony in apartments during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of covid-19 through viral contaminated surfaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Breakthrough infections despite vaccine launch","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of microbial infections, especially sars-cov-2, due to contaminated surfaces.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Longevity of sars-cov-2 on surfaces, leading to prolonged exposure risk.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited research on disinfection and killing mechanisms of sars-cov-2 on various surfaces.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of the virus through airborne aerosols and droplets on various surfaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overuse of surface disinfectant chemicals like sodium hypochlorite, hydrogen peroxide, or alcohol can have toxic effects and irritate occupants","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Debatable antimicrobial mechanism of graphene materials","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of pandemics","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological impact of pandemics","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic impact of pandemics","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inclusion of irrelevant papers that do not meet the study criteria could lead to inaccurate findings.","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate classification or categorization of interventions may affect the reliability of the findings.","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conflicts between reviewers in selecting relevant citations may introduce bias and affect the study’s integrity.","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Authors in close contact during manuscript drafting","category":"Working","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Collection and reanalysis of clinical data by multiple authors","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear role of airborne particles in virus transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in discriminating between airborne transmission and transmission through respiratory droplets","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of quantitative data for defining environmental control measures against covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of uvgi effectiveness","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of scientific certainty in evaluating indoor environmental quality control","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population density and mobility in jakarta contribute to fast transmission of covid-19.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High association of covid-19 infections with air pollution in cities, particularly those exceeding pollution limits.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weakened defenses in regions with poor air quality due to chronic exposure to atmospheric pollution, particularly affecting vulnerable groups like the elderly.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improvement of air quality in barcelona, spain, under lockdown measures.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction of urban air pollution due to lockdown measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation between no2 levels and covid-19 outbreak","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
